item.title: Elecon Engineering Q3 FY26: Profit Plunge Raises Concerns Despite Revenue Resilience
item.description: Elecon Engineering Company Ltd., a leading manufacturer of material handling equipment and power transmission solutions, reported a concerning quarter-on-quarter decline in profitability for Q3 FY26, despite maintaining revenue stability. The company posted a consolidated net profit of ₹71.99 crores for the quarter ended December 2025, marking a sharp 17.93% decline from the previous quarter's ₹87.72 crores. More worryingly, on a year-on-year basis, net profit plummeted 33.06% from ₹107.54 crores in Q3 FY25, signalling deteriorating operational performance. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Transformers & Rectifiers India Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Transformers & Rectifiers India Ltd reported strong Q3 FY26 results with a net profit of ₹73.85 crores and record net sales of ₹736.76 crores, reflecting robust operational performance. However, the stock price declined amid market volatility, indicating mixed investor sentiment despite the positive financial metrics. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Yuranus Infrastructure Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Yuranus Infrastructure Ltd's latest results are concerning, showing a dramatic but misleading sales increase alongside persistent operating losses and a deteriorating financial position, with five consecutive quarters of losses totaling ₹1.25 crores. The company faces significant operational challenges and a declining return on equity and capital employed. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Eimco Elecon (India) Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Eimco Elecon (India) Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results show a net profit of ₹12.52 crores and a significant sales increase of 74.72%, indicating recovery; however, concerns remain due to a low return on equity of 4.92% and reliance on other income, suggesting ongoing operational challenges. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Madhya Bharat Agro Products Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Madhya Bharat Agro Products Ltd's latest results are positive, showing a 115.84% increase in revenue and a 77.41% rise in net profit year-on-year. However, the operating margin has declined, indicating challenges in maintaining profitability amidst growth. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Aries Agro Ltd Forms Death Cross, Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: Aries Agro Ltd, a micro-cap player in the fertilisers sector, has recently formed a Death Cross as its 50-day moving average (DMA) crossed below the 200-DMA, signalling a potential shift towards a bearish trend. This technical development, coupled with deteriorating momentum indicators and a recent downgrade in its Mojo Grade to Sell, raises concerns about the stock’s near to medium-term outlook. Time: 2 hours ago
